text: The Sherbino Wind Farm is in Pecos County in west Texas. The first 150 megawatts (MW) of the project, which will be able to create 750 MW, is in operation. Phase I uses 50 Vestas V-90 wind turbine generators, each with a rated capacity of 3 MW. BP will operate phase I of the project.BP Starts Full Commercial Operation at Texas Wind Farm ==Related pages== *List of large wind farms *Wind farms *Wind power *Wind power in the United States *Wind power in Texas ==References== Category:Wind farms in Texas
title: Sherbino Wind Farm
